entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
